original_text: “In my vision at night I looked, and there before me was one like a son of man, coming with the clouds of heaven. He approached the Ancient of Days and was led into his presence.
korean_text: 내가 또 밤 환상 중에 보니 인자 같은 이가 하늘 구름을 타고 와서 옛적부터 항상 계신 이에게 나아가 그 앞으로 인도되매

sentences.original_text: In my vision at night I looked
and there before me was one like a son of man
sentences.korean_translation: 내 앞에 인자 같은 이가 있었고

sentences.original_text: coming with the clouds of heaven
He approached the Ancient of Days
and was led into his presence
